document_title: Anal abscess: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Anal abscesses arise from many different causes, mainly due to infection, specifically as follows:(2)
Anal gland infection is caused by the colonization of aerobic bacteria (Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus and Escherichia coli) and anaerobic bacteria (Acteroides fragilis, Peptostreptococcus, Prevotella, Fusobacterium, Porphyromonas and Clostridium).; Injury.; Suffering from the following diseases: Crohn's disease, tuberculosis, sexually transmitted diseases, enteritis, cancer...; Anal gland obstruction.; Using some medications to treat anorectal diseases incorrectly or using them for a long time causes tissue inflammation.; The anus, rectum, urethra... had undergone minor surgery but the medical instruments were not sterile leading to infection and abscess formation.

ap xe hau mon.json. Causes of anal abscess
Anal abscesses arise from many different causes, mainly due to infection, specifically as follows:(2)
Anal gland infection is caused by the colonization of aerobic bacteria (Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus and Escherichia coli) and anaerobic bacteria (Acteroides fragilis, Peptostreptococcus, Prevotella, Fusobacterium, Porphyromonas and Clostridium).; Injury.; Suffering from the following diseases: Crohn's disease, tuberculosis, sexually transmitted diseases, enteritis, cancer...; Anal gland obstruction.; Using some medications to treat anorectal diseases incorrectly or using them for a long time causes tissue inflammation.; The anus, rectum, urethra... had undergone minor surgery but the medical instruments were not sterile leading to infection and abscess formation.
